card_text: A positive result or advantage gained from something is known as a _______. People often seek a _______ when they invest time or money into a project. Employees may receive health insurance as a _______ of their job. Regular exercise provides numerous _______s for both physical and mental health. Governments may offer tax _______s to encourage certain behaviors, like buying eco-friendly cars.
image_prompt: A lush, green park with a person jogging on a well-maintained path, showcasing the benefits of regular exercise. In the background, a modern office building with a sign indicating health insurance benefits for employees. Nearby, an eco-friendly car parked with a visible tax incentive sticker. The scene should be vibrant and positive, illustrating various advantages people can gain. No text in the image.
